neighbors.name: Josue & Diana Flores
neighbors.claims: Public records do not confirm Josue and Diana Flores as the current owners of Cochise County parcel 106-06-019A in available online datasets, though the parcel number format is consistent with the Huachuca City area ([LandSearch](https://www.landsearch.com/properties/2031-w-cougar-pl-huachuca-city-az-85616/4693999)). Property records in other jurisdictions (San Bernardino, CA) link these names to real estate, but no definitive link to Cochise County was found ([SBC Sentinel](https://sbcsentinel.com/page/356/)). No public positions on development were found for this entity.

approach_recommendations.engage: Initiate contact with a friendly introduction to verify ownership and residency, as public records are inconclusive. Emphasize open communication and respect for privacy.

citations.claim: Parcel number format consistent with Huachuca City area
citations.title: 2031 W Cougar Pl, Huachuca City, AZ 85616

citations.claim: Names linked to property in San Bernardino County, CA
citations.title: San Bernardino County Sentinel Trustee Notices

neighbors.name: Loren J. Sheldon
neighbors.claims: Loren J. Sheldon is a registered agent for a corporate entity located on Bowers Road in Huachuca City, Cochise County ([AZCC](https://ecorp.azcc.gov/CommonHelper/GetFilingDocuments?barcode=00254190)). He has not been identified in local news or public meetings regarding land development, suggesting no documented stance or public involvement.

approach_recommendations.engage: Approach Mr. Sheldon one-on-one, noting his residency in Huachuca City. Listen to concerns about land use and explain measures to preserve local quality of life.

citations.claim: Loren J. Sheldon associated with Bowers Road in Huachuca City
citations.title: Arizona Corporation Commission Filing

neighbors.name: Richard E. & Julia Ann Wilson
neighbors.claims: Parcel 106-06-018P is identified as a single-family residence at 2031 W Cougar Pl, Huachuca City, AZ ([LandSearch](https://www.landsearch.com/properties/2031-w-cougar-pl-huachuca-city-az-85616/4693999)). The property was listed for sale with a pending status as of early 2026 ([Zillow](https://www.zillow.com/homedetails/2031-W-Cougar-Pl-Huachuca-City-AZ-85616/7398945_zpid/)). Richard E. Wilson has historically been associated with Cochise College in federal records ([GovernmentAttic](https://www.governmentattic.org/docs/FOIA_Logs_DeptOfEducation_Fy2000-05.pdf)). No public statements on development by the Wilsons were found.

approach_recommendations.engage: Verify if the Wilsons still retain ownership as the property status is pending. If they are the sellers, discuss property value protection; if residents, focus on community benefits.

citations.claim: Parcel 106-06-018P is 2031 W Cougar Pl, Huachuca City
citations.title: 2031 W Cougar Pl Property Details
